translation.en: [voice trembling] We were always there for each other
The war between our families will be bloody.
translation.ko: 우리 두 가문이 싸우면 피바다가 될 거야

translation.en: And no one will emerge victorious from it.
Lots of bad things have happened,
but it would be good for us to forget about this, uh…
translation.ko: 그래도 그건 잊는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: I should have said, "after this tragedy."
translation.ko: 그 비극이 일어난 후에 말했어야 했는데

translation.en: She wouldn't be happy… seeing you crying.
translation.ko: 올가가 우는 걸 보면 속상해할 거예요

translation.en: Look, I'll tell you one time, and I won't say it again.
translation.ko: 딱 한 번 말한다, 반복 안 해

translation.en: [Massimo] This is Sicily. It's my territory.
You will never step a foot in here again.
translation.ko: 다시는 한 발짝도 들어와선 안 돼

translation.en: I will make sure of it.
I will turn your ridiculous island into a graveyard.
translation.ko: 같잖은 너희 섬은 묘지가 될 줄 알아

translation.en: [in Italian] Tell them to get the fuck out of here. Now.
The doctor said that it's too soon.
I don't care what the doctor said.
translation.ko: 난 의사 말 상관 안 해

translation.en: I know how I feel, and I know what I need.
translation.ko: 난 내 감정도 알고 뭐가 필요한지도 알아

translation.en: And it's definitely not lying in a bed and feeling sorry for myself.
translation.ko: 침대에 누워서 자기 연민에 빠져 있는 건 분명히 아니야

translation.en: [sighs] What is it with you and resting?
I've had enough rest to last me a lifetime.
translation.ko: 한동안 안 쉬어도 될 만큼 충분히 쉬었어

translation.en: I'm tired of lying in bed and having you baby me.
translation.ko: 통나무처럼 누워서 너한테 응석받이로 다뤄지는 거 지겨워

translation.en: [in English] Raquel, please bring us a bottle of wine.
[in Polish] That's hardcore. It's not even 11:00 yet.
Need I remind you that you almost died?
-Getting drunk at breakfast is a bad idea. -For fuck's sake.
translation.ko: 아침에 취하는 건 좋은 생각 아니야 잡소리 집어치워

translation.en: Why does everyone suddenly think they know what I need?
translation.ko: 왜 다들 갑자기 나한테 필요한 걸 나보다 더 잘 알아?

translation.en: Do you have any idea what we've been through?
I've never been so afraid of losing you.

translation.ko: 난 마시모 심장이 고장 나는 줄 알았어

translation.en: Olo, I know how hard it was for you and I know you're worried about me,
translation.ko: 힘들었다는 것도 날 걱정한다는 것도 잘 알아

translation.en: but I've been given a second chance.
translation.ko: 하지만 인생이 두 번째 기회를 줬잖아

translation.en: I want to make the most of it.
Besides, we haven't even toasted to you changing your mind about marriage.
translation.ko: 게다가 네가 드디어 결혼의 가치를 믿는데 축배도 안 들었잖아

translation.en: [in Polish] I can't look at that hair sober.
translation.ko: 맨정신으로는 네 머리 그 꼴인 거 못 참아

translation.en: [in English] Uh, hello, Giuseppe? Can we fix hair today?
translation.ko: 여보세요, 주세페? 오늘 머리할 수 있어요?

translation.en: Right now? Okay. Let's go. Let's go.
You have a meeting. I'm so sorry.
Could you come and see me when you're done?
[in Polish] Wow. So you're ready to go, then.
And what makes you say that? You're not wearing any panties.
translation.ko: - 왜 그렇게 생각하는데? - 팬티 안 입었잖아

translation.en: But that's not the only thing.
translation.ko: 그런다고 감출 수 있는 게 아니야

translation.en: So what? We bumped into each other-- "And I fucked him."
Listen, I want to hear every kinky little detail, got it?
Quit smirking and come help me, or we'll never get out the door.
translation.ko: 그만 실실 웃고 도와줘 이러다 나가지도 못하겠어

translation.en: I've already got everything picked out. Here.
Did you tell Massimo we were going out?
He doesn't tell me when he goes out. Fuck. Well, this is gonna be interesting!
translation.ko: - 마시모도 나갈 때 말 안 해 - 맙소사! 너무 재밌겠다!

translation.en: -Come on, really? This place? -What's the big deal?
translation.ko: 장난해? 여기 가자고? 왜? 이 동네 제일 좋은 식당들은 다 토리첼리 가문 거잖아

translation.en: All the good restaurants in town belong to the Torricellis.
translation.ko: 왜? 이 동네 제일 좋은 식당들은 다 토리첼리 가문 거잖아

translation.en: [groans] Now, that's what I call a food baby.
translation.ko: 내가 이런 배를 두고 '음식을 임신했다'고 하지
몸이 커지면 사랑할 데가 많아지는 거야

translation.en: Where did you get my number?
You know… I am who I am.
-[waiter, in Italian] How was everything? -Great. Thanks.
Olo, sometimes the truth is complicated.
Lari, what happened on that island?
translation.ko: 라리, 그 섬에서 무슨 일 있었어?

translation.en: I ran away with him after Massimo cheated with Anna.
translation.ko: 마시모가 안나랑 바람피웠을 때 그 사람이랑 달아났었어

translation.en: Hold on. I thought that was a plot against Massimo.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 난 마시모가 음모에 빠졌던 걸로 아는데

translation.en: [Laura] It was, but I didn't know it at the time.
Nacho was like my… best friend.
[Olga] Seriously? You saw the guy twice, and now he's your best friend?
translation.ko: 진심이야? 네 인생에서 두 번 보고 절친?

translation.en: Whatever. I'm not here to lecture you.
But he was there for me when my whole world was falling apart.
translation.ko: 하지만 내 세상이 무너졌을 때 옆에 있어 줬어

translation.en: He took care of me, and I felt free.
translation.ko: 날 돌봐 줬지 그리고 난 자유를 느꼈어

translation.en: I have to forget about him.
Don't be ridiculous. He's just some guy.
-♪ Just vibe on my danger… ♪ -Since when do you go out without me?
A little, before Domenico almost killed Olga with his tongue.
translation.ko: 도메니코가 와서 올가한테 혀로 죽일 듯이 덤비기 전에 약간

translation.en: [Laura] Baby, I think that you are drunk, and, um…
Maybe we can talk about this another time?
You'd like to know what happened? Your ex shot me.
translation.ko: 무슨 일 있었는지 알고 싶어? 당신의 전 애인이 날 쐈지

translation.en: What happened between you and Matos?
You ran away with him when you thought that I was cheating on you with Anna.
translation.ko: 내가 안나 만나는 줄 알고 놈이랑 달아났잖아!

translation.en: It would've never happened if you'd told me about your twin brother!
translation.ko: 쌍둥이 동생 얘기를 해줬으면 안 일어났을 일이야

translation.en: That twin brother that told me that you were pregnant?
translation.ko: 당신이 임신했었다고 말해 준 그 쌍둥이 동생?

translation.en: I wanted to protect the family, and I knew what you would do
translation.ko: 가족을 보호하고 싶었어 그리고 사고로 아이 잃은 걸 알면

translation.en: if you found out that I'd lost the baby in the accident.
I didn't want to be the cause of another war.
translation.ko: 또 다른 전쟁의 빌미가 되는 거 싫었어

translation.en: You had no right… no right to hide it from me.
translation.ko: 당신은 그걸 나한테 숨길 권리가 없었어

translation.en: It was our baby, who died because of your enemies.
translation.ko: 우리 아기였어 당신의 적 때문에 죽은 우리 아기

translation.en: I think I have a hangover.
I think you're hiding something from me.
translation.ko: 내 생각엔 뭔가 숨기는 것 같아

translation.en: And you're just telling me this now?
No. Fix this today. I don't give a shit.
translation.ko: 아니, 오늘 해결해, 난 상관 안 해

translation.en: I've known you my entire life.
These kinds of things never get to you.
Either you're getting old, or something else is up.
translation.ko: 나이가 들어간다는 뜻이거나 다른 일이 있는 거야

translation.en: I will be in the atelier today. Please expect me.
translation.ko: 오늘 아틀리에에 갈 거예요 기다려 줘요

translation.en: [in Polish] Hey! Why the hell are you in such a hurry?
My marriage is falling apart, so I'm focusing on my career.
translation.ko: 내 결혼 생활이 파탄 나고 있으니 일에 집중하는 거야, 빨리 와

translation.en: That's great, but do we really have to walk this much?
translation.ko: 그래, 좋아 하지만 꼭 걸어가야 해?

translation.en: -[in English] I like those colors. -I know, but that's too fancy.
translation.ko: - 색깔이 맘에 들어요 - 네, 근데 너무 화려해요

translation.en: That's Michele, but he's very moody.
Laura, do you realize how much work we still have?
Yeah, and this is so perfect because, you know, I will keep my head busy.
translation.ko: 네, 그래서 너무 좋네요 머리가 계속 바쁠 테니까요

translation.en: Got it! What about this one?
-My little… -I'll call you. Bye. Love you.
translation.ko: - 우리 귀여운… - 또 할게요, 끊어요, 사랑해요

translation.en: [in Polish] The photographer needs to be tall and handsome.
Plus, if the photos are from below, it'll look like we have double chins,
translation.ko: 아래에서 위로 찍히면 안 돼 이중 턱으로 나온단 말이야 우린 그거 싫어
이중 턱으로 나온단 말이야 우린 그거 싫어

translation.en: Just like this. Click, click, click.
Okay, fine. He can be short and handsome, but he's gonna need a ladder.
translation.ko: 그래, 키 작고 잘생겨도 돼 하지만 사다리는 필수야

translation.en: And then I'll plop my bare ass right on the cake.
translation.ko: 그런 다음에 맨 엉덩이로 케이크 위에 앉을 거야

translation.en: Shit, you're not listening to me.
What kind of photographer do I want?
One with his ass in the cake.
You're unbelievable! I can't believe you!
I'll catch up with you later.
-♪ Fuck society ♪ -[Massimo, in English] On your knees.
[in English] I didn't know you were coming early today.
I guess I'll have benefits from it, yeah?
[in Polish] Did you see the email? Go on, read it!
[in English] Hey, girls, it's only 9:00 a.m., and you're already drunk.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 오전 9시밖에 안 됐는데 벌써 취했군요

translation.en: [restrained] Um, yeah, because we're going to Lagos Fashion Fair.
Sorry, I couldn't leave amore mio with a hard-on.
translation.ko: 미안, 내 사랑이 벌떡 서 있는데 어떻게 그냥 나와

translation.en: And now… what happens in Lagos stays in Lagos!
translation.ko: 자, 이제 라구스에서 일어나는 일은 라구스에 묻는 거야!

translation.en: -They were in the villa the entire time? -The whole day, why?
translation.ko: - 남자들 내내 별장에 있었어? - 온종일, 왜?

translation.en: He didn't even come to say goodbye?
I don't think we can fix this.
translation.ko: 우리 해결 못 할 것 같아

translation.en: Are you trying to fucking scare me to death?
You're going out drinking with me in this?
We've got a big meeting tomorrow. I want to rest.
translation.ko: 내일 중요한 미팅 있잖아 쉬고 싶어

translation.en: -Weren't you the one talking about change? -Watch me.
-"I'm back from the dead!" -Look at me. I'm lying down.
-Wait, what was it you said? -[Laura] I'm beginning to live.
What a poet. Shame you don't practice what you preach.
translation.ko: 대단한 시인 나셨네 말뿐인 게 안타깝다

translation.en: -Get up! I'm not sitting around all day! -Ola, no!
translation.ko: - 일어나! 난 방에 안 있을 거야! - 올로, 안 돼!

translation.en: [in Polish] Hey, the view's pretty good down here.
How can you be that into messing up your hair in the waves?
translation.ko: 바닷물에 머리가 망가지는데 어떻게 신날 수가 있지?

translation.en: It's just you and the water.
What are you, a surfing guru? Have you ever even stood on a board?
translation.ko: 서핑 전문가야? 저런 판때기에 서 본 적이나 있어?

translation.en: Except I spent most of my time in the water.
[announcer, in English] Now give it up for our champion, Marcelo Nacho Matos!
translation.ko: 자, 챔피언에게 박수 주세요 마르첼로 나초 마토스입니다!

translation.en: -Are you crazy? We just got here. -We have to leave now.
translation.ko: - 무슨 소리야? 방금 왔잖아 - 당장 가야 된다고

translation.en: The guy who got me from the ball. He can't see me.
translation.ko: 무도회에서 나 데려간 남자 말이야 보면 안 돼

translation.en: -That's his sister Amelia. -You met his sister?
-What about his mom? Grandma too? -Stop it.
translation.ko: - 엄마, 할머니도 아는 거 아니야? - 그만해

translation.en: -Olo, I have to get out of here. -I'll shield you with my body.
translation.ko: - 여기서 빠져나가야 해 - 쉿, 내가 몸으로 가릴게

translation.en: [in English] I love surfing, so, so much!
[in Polish] I don't fucking believe it!
Now tell me everything. I want every little detail.
translation.ko: 전부 다 말해 줘 하나도 빠뜨리지 말고

translation.en: Where? Hey, Lari. Let's go to the bar.
translation.ko: 어디 가? 야, 바 쪽으로 가자

translation.en: [in English] One cold beer, served by a hot bartender, please.
translation.ko: 섹시한 바텐더가 주는 시원한 맥주 한 잔 부탁해요

translation.en: The best local beer for the gorgeous friend.
translation.ko: 멋진 친구를 위한 이 지역 최고의 맥주죠

translation.en: [in Polish] Well, Olo, that beer goes really well with your dress.
translation.ko: 뭐야, 올로, 그 맥주가 네 드레스랑 아주 찰떡이다

translation.en: I've been classy for over an hour now. This is long overdue. [laughs]
translation.ko: 나 1시간 넘게 고상 떨었어 그만하면 충분해

translation.en: -[in English] One glass of champagne. -[bartender] Sure.
Hi, I'm Maria. We wrote to each other. Nice to meet you.
Uh, it's a pleasure. But please, call me Laura.
I'll show you around and introduce you to a few people.
translation.ko: 여기 한 바퀴 돌면서 사람들 소개해 드릴게요
- 한 병 더 줘요 - 그만 가시죠

translation.en: [in Polish] Let go of me, for fuck's sake! What the hell is this?
Oh my God. And that dress! Where is this from?
Um, it's from my new collection. Actually, the first one.
translation.ko: 내 컬렉션의 새 작품이에요 실은 첫 번째 거죠

translation.en: When I'm gonna be back in shape, I'm gonna become your most faithful client, I swear.
translation.ko: 나 살 빼면 라우라의 최우수 고객 될래요

translation.en: [Amelia] I think you would look great in it.
[Olga, in Polish] Let go of me!
[Olga grunts] Vittorio, listen. I'll go to my room by my own.
translation.ko: 비토리오, 잘 들어요 방에 혼자 갈 수 있다고요

translation.en: [Vittorio] Mrs. Torricelli told me to lock you in your room.
[in English] Go. [in Polish] Mrs. Tortellini can kiss my ass!
I'm glad to see you in good shape. I was really worried about you.
translation.ko: 건강해 보여서 다행이에요 걱정 정말 많이 했어요

translation.en: But you know, not only me.
You know, my brother was like a shadow of a man.
Laura, you know he's not a bad person, right?
translation.ko: 라우라, 우리 오빠 나쁜 사람 아닌 거 알죠?

translation.en: He's just loyal to his father.
It doesn't justify the way he treated me.
translation.ko: 그래도 나한테 한 건 정당화되지 않아요

translation.en: I know. And when I found out what he had done, I didn't talk to him, like, for a week.
translation.ko: 알아요, 그 사실을 알고 나서 오빠랑 일주일간 말도 안 했어요

translation.en: I know he hurt you deeply.
But believe me, he has learned a very painful lesson.
translation.ko: 하지만 이건 믿어줘요 오빠는 뼈아픈 교훈을 얻었어요

translation.en: -Shut up! What are you doing? -[Olga] Oh! I want to sleep!
translation.ko: 조용히 해! 뭐 하는 거야? 자고 싶다고!

translation.en: Hello, my dear friend! Do you have a local beer?
translation.ko: 안녕, 친구, 이 지역 맥주 있어?

translation.en: [man] Shut up! I want to sleep!
[whining] She's out there getting laid, and she locks me away in a hotel room.
translation.ko: 자기는 신나게 즐기면서 난 방에 가두다니

translation.en: Without a single drop of alcohol!
[sighs] There we go. There we go.
[in English] Hello! Do you hear me? Can you help me, please?
translation.ko: 저기요, 내 말 들려요? 좀 도와주실래요?

translation.en: Mrs. Olga, please! Back to your room! I must go to Mrs. Torricelli!
translation.ko: 올가 부인, 제발 방에 가요! 토리첼리 부인한테 가야 한다고요!

translation.en: What is wrong with you? I want to go to the party right now!
translation.ko: 당신 왜 그래? 난 파티 가고 싶다고, 당장!

translation.en: [in English] How could you do this to me?
Everything was so perfect until you showed up.
translation.ko: 당신이 나타나기 전까진 모든 게 완벽했는데

translation.en: -♪ I'm crying to the stars ♪ -[softly] I think I'm in love with you.
You can run away from me…
but you can't run away from what you feel.
How do you know what I feel?
Your body is a worse liar than you are.
[softly] I need to go back to the hotel.
You've already lost your way once.
translation.ko: 당신은 이미 길을 한 번 잃었어

translation.en: I will give you time, Little Bee.
Even for the rest of my life.
Maybe you will have to wait forever.
You think that I want only--
I want to watch it forever.
For sure, Massimo got mad because he wasn't able to track me.
translation.ko: 내가 추적 안 돼서 마시모 분명히 화났을 거야

translation.en: If you don't want to, you don't have to go back.
It would be the easiest way. But at this moment, I--
translation.ko: 그게 제일 쉬운 방법이겠지 하지만 지금은…

translation.en: I won't force you to do anything.
You will always have a choice.
That's why I saved his life.

translation.ko: - 그 얘기 못 들었군 - 뭘 말이야?

translation.en: When Anna shot you instead of Massimo, she tried to shoot him again.
translation.ko: 안나가 마시모 대신 당신 쐈을 때 또다시 마시모를 쏘려고 했어

translation.en: I didn't allow it. I killed her.
I don't want my happiness at the cost of your suffering.
translation.ko: 내 행복을 위해 당신을 괴롭게 하고 싶지 않아

translation.en: I want you to want me.
It would be easier for you.
Bee, you don't have to be with me because you don't have another choice.
translation.ko: 자기, 선택의 여지가 없어서 나랑 있을 필요는 없어

translation.en: I want you to choose life with me.
translation.ko: 나와 함께하는 삶을 선택해 주면 좋겠어

translation.en: I will wait for you… until you're ready.
I went for a walk, to think.
I'm one step away from asking you for a divorce.
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. I'm talking to you. I'm talking to you.
When I got shot, our relationship almost died with me.
translation.ko: 내가 총 맞았을 때 우리 관계는 거의 죽었어

translation.en: I was trying to save it, and you, you were speculating
and diving into your dark limbo, which I was not allowed to enter.
translation.ko: 그 어두운 림보 세계로 숨었어 난 들어가지도 못하게 하고

translation.en: Now I'm in my own limbo.
I don't know what I want, but I'm alone there.
translation.ko: 내가 뭘 원하는지 모르겠어 하지만 혼자야

translation.en: And I need space to find out what I feel.
translation.ko: 그리고 이 감정이 뭔지 알아낼 시간이 필요해

translation.en: This white shit has replaced me.
I'm going to sleep in Olga's room tonight.
And I expect you to leave for Sicily tomorrow
translation.ko: 그리고 당신이 내일 시칠리아로 가면 좋겠어

translation.en: to give me the time and space I need.
And do not think of following me.
translation.ko: 그리고 날 쫓아올 생각은 하지 마

translation.en: The plane is to your disposal.
You managed to lock this tiger in a cage.
Have you completely lost your fucking mind?
You've gone crazy for some dick you hardly know
translation.ko: 알지도 못하는 놈팡이 때문에 정신 줄을 놔?

translation.en: just because he makes you wet?
Well? Are you going to break up your marriage and family for him?
translation.ko: 그 남자 때문에 네 결혼, 가족 다 망칠 거야?

translation.en: and you're already acting like a Torricelli.
Spare me the bullshit about family loyalty.
translation.ko: 가문에 충실 어쩌고 하는 헛소리는 나한테 하지 마

translation.en: What am I supposed to do?
Wait until Massimo deals with his shit and remembers I'm his wife?
translation.ko: 마시모가 감정을 해결하고 아내가 있단 사실을 떠올리길 기다려?

translation.en: Who are you looking out for? Me or yourself?
translation.ko: 지금 누구 걱정을 하는 거야? 나? 너?

translation.en: I have to figure out what I really want.
translation.ko: 내가 진짜 원하는 게 뭔지 알아내야 하니까

translation.en: I'm sorry I didn't ask how you're feeling, or if you need anything.
translation.ko: 어떤 기분인지, 필요한 건 없는지 안 물어봐서 미안해

translation.en: I want you to be happy.
Whatever you decide, I'll support you. You hear me?
translation.ko: 어떤 결정을 내리든 난 네 편이야, 알았지?

translation.en: Remember, just say the word, and I'll fucking kill both of them.
translation.ko: 그리고 말만 해 내가 두 남자 다 죽여버릴게

translation.en: And I'll find you a nice, calm guy from a village near Radom, okay?
translation.ko: 그리고 라돔 근처 마을에서 차분하고 착한 남자 하나 찾아줄게

translation.en: You'll grow old and die of boredom.
You came here on a motorcycle?
You're gonna give me a heart attack.
translation.ko: 내가 너 때문에 언젠가는 심장 마비 걸리지

translation.en: You know how much I hate your escapades.
translation.ko: 둘이 철없는 그 짓 하는 걸 얼마나 싫어하는지 알잖아

translation.en: Happy to see you too, Mom.
Come in. I've got some pork chops.
Of course, you never call ahead.
You could have told me you were coming.
translation.ko: 오면 온다고 미리 전화할 수도 있잖아

translation.en: I always have to think on my feet.
What do you mean? Nothing's going on. I'm just here to visit you.
translation.ko: 무슨 일은요, 아무 일 없어요 부모님 뵈러 온 거죠

translation.en: Your mom is convinced that people buy motorcycles
translation.ko: 네 엄마는 사람들이 위기 같은 걸 겪을 때

translation.en: when they're going through some kind of crisis.
translation.ko: 네 엄마는 사람들이 위기 같은 걸 겪을 때 오토바이를 산다고 믿거든

translation.en: If you were okay, you'd be spending your birthday with your husband,
celebrating the anniversary of your first meeting.
translation.ko: 너희가 처음 만난 기념일을 축하하고 있을 거잖아

translation.en: -As far as I know-- -I'm in love with someone else.
translation.ko: - 내가 알기론… - 저 사랑에 빠진 것 같아요

translation.en: But we agreed that we wouldn't smoke anymore.
Honey, if you weren't married to Massimo, who would you choose?
The problem is, I don't know.
When you have the answer, you'll know what to do.
translation.ko: 그 질문의 답을 찾으면 어떻게 해야 할지 알 거야

translation.en: [whispering] I'll tell you a little secret.
I think it's what's kept our marriage alive for 35 years.
translation.ko: 우리가 35년간 결혼 생활을 유지할 수 있었던 이유지

translation.en: Remember, a woman must be selfish in a relationship.
translation.ko: 명심해, 부부 사이에 있어서 여자는 이기적이어야 해

translation.en: If you put your own happiness first,
you'll do whatever it takes to make it last, right?
translation.ko: 그걸 지속시키기 위해 뭐든 하는 법이야, 알겠어?

translation.en: But it can't be a relationship that destroys you.
translation.ko: 하지만 널 무너뜨리지 않는 관계여야 하지

translation.en: Remember that a woman who lives only for her man
And her man will be unhappy too.
Coffee for Dad. And for his daughter?
Sometimes I wish I was still that little girl
you used to take out for lemonade.
You'll always be my little girl.
I like spending time with you
because I can eat as much as I want and not feel guilty.
translation.ko: 죄책감 없이 실컷 먹을 수 있어서요

translation.en: There are two things you never point out to a woman.
translation.ko: 이거 알아요? 여자한테 절대 지적하면 안 되는 2가지가 있어요

translation.en: Her age and the amount of food she eats.
I never knew about the second one.
-You should. -Okay, I'll keep that in mind.
-Just a second. Olga won't stop calling. -Okay.
translation.ko: 올가한테 전화해야겠어요 포기를 안 해요 그래

translation.en: Hello. Answer my calls, or I'll have a heart attack.
translation.ko: 제발 전화 좀 받아 나 심장 마비 일으키고 싶어?

translation.en: You want to know what's up?
Massimo knows about everything, Lari. He knows about you and Nacho!
translation.ko: 마시모가 다 알아 너랑 나초에 대해서!

translation.en: He's gonna kill you, me, and God knows who else!
translation.ko: 그리고 너, 나, 그 사람 다 죽일 거야!

translation.en: [whispering] No, I overheard him talking to Domenico.
Um, how did you know what they were talking about?
But I was pissed off about not understanding, so I learned.
translation.ko: 못 알아들으니까 너무 짜증 나서 배웠지

translation.en: Maybe I'm not a fluent speaker, but I understand everything.
translation.ko: 유창하진 않지만 다 알아들을 순 있어

translation.en: You know how to say, "Nacho fucked Laura"?
I guess it's time to go back to Sicily.
translation.ko: 시칠리아로 돌아갈 때가 된 것 같다

translation.en: Are you fucking insane? He knows!
Shoot! Fuck knows what he's gonna do!
I'd rather him shoot himself than you or me.
translation.ko: 너나 나 말고 본인한테 쏘면 좋겠다

translation.en: Olo, stop. There must be a reason he hasn't done anything about it yet.
translation.ko: 그만, 아직 아무것도 안 한 이유가 분명히 있을 거야

translation.en: Are you even listening to me? Massimo won't forgive cheating.
translation.ko: 내 말 듣기나 해? 외도를 용서 안 할 거라고

translation.en: I'm not scared of my own husband. I won't hide from him.
translation.ko: 난 내 남편 두렵지 않아 숨지 않을 거야

translation.en: Do what you want. I'm working on… an escape plan.
translation.ko: 원하는 대로 해라 나는 대피 계획을 짤 테니까

translation.en: Olo, relax. Have a cigarette, okay?
translation.ko: 그래, 진정하고 담배 한 대 피워

translation.en: What the hell do you think I'm doing? I can't stop smoking!
translation.ko: 내가 뭐 할 거 같은데? 줄담배 피우고 있지!

translation.en: Dad, I have to go back to Sicily.
But first, let's go back to the table. I ordered some apple pie.
translation.ko: 근데 일단 테이블로 돌아갈까? 내가 사과파이 주문했어

translation.en: what did you not understand when I told you not to push me?
translation.ko: 나한테 강요하지 말라고 했을 때 뭐가 이해가 안 됐나요?

translation.en: by coming here, I'm risking my life and also my father's life in business.
translation.ko: 내 목숨뿐 아니라 아버지의 비즈니스 목숨을 걸고 여기 왔어

translation.en: We have a pact with Massimo not to enter his territory.
translation.ko: 영역에 들어오지 않기로 마시모와 맺은 협약 때문에

translation.en: because I needed to see you.
Hear me out, and then do what you want.
translation.ko: 내 말부터 듣고 하고 싶은 대로 해

translation.en: Okay, Mr. Fabio Rossi. Let's go.
You know the address. You used to work there as a gardener.
You wanted to tell me something.
I want to be honest with you.
I understand what it means to be best friends with your lover.
translation.ko: 연인과 절친이 된다는 게 무슨 뜻인지 알게 됐어

translation.en: I didn't fall in love with you at first sight.
I came to like you first.
For the way you get angry… the way you squint your eyes.
When you smile without a reason. [chuckles]
I wanna discover new things with you. I wanna show you the sunrise in Burma.
translation.ko: 당신과 새로운 걸 발견하고 싶어 미얀마의 일출을 보여주고 싶어

translation.en: I wanna meditate with you in Bali.
And get drunk with you in Tokyo.
I know it sounds silly, but…
translation.ko: 바보 같은 말인 거 알아, 하지만…

translation.en: I have no idea when you became my world, Laura.
translation.ko: 당신이 언제 내 세상이 됐는지 모르겠어

translation.en: I can't live without this world, and I don't want to.
translation.ko: 난 이 세상이 없으면 못 살아 그러고 싶지도 않아

translation.en: I don't know how to convince you.
I'm ready to give you everything.
translation.ko: 모든 걸 줄 준비가 돼 있어

translation.en: Thank you for finding the courage to tell me all of this.
translation.ko: 용기 내서 그런 말 해줘서 고마워

translation.en: But I also need to speak with Massimo.
I can't stay in that situation anymore.
translation.ko: 계속 이 상태로 있을 순 없어

translation.en: Okay. I packed just one suitcase.
I grabbed your stuff too. It'll be a quick escape.
translation.ko: 네 것도 쌌어 금방 빠져나갈 수 있을 거야

translation.en: Why the fuck didn't you call or text?
I would've sent a driver for you.
Are you serious? Now's not the best time-- Fuck.
translation.ko: 장난해? 지금 그럴 때가 아니라고, 젠장!

translation.en: Have you forgotten your husband's line of work? [inhales sharply]
translation.ko: 네 남편이 무슨 일 하는지 잊었어?

translation.en: Why don't you bring him with you,
translation.ko: 수다 떨게 저 남자도 데려가지 그래?

translation.en: and I'll look up how to send a dead body back to Poland?
[in Polish] God, it's so sad. You're going to die on your birthday.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 이렇게 슬플 수가 넌 생일에 죽는구나

translation.en: If you survive, I bought you a really nice bag.
translation.ko: 혹시 살면 선물로 산 멋진 핸드백 줄게

translation.en: If something happens, I'll keep it.
We need to work things out.
And when I get back, we'll drink to my resurrection, okay?
translation.ko: 내가 돌아오면 부활의 축배를 들자, 알았지?

translation.en: -I'm doing this alone. -Oh yeah, alone. I'll stay here and wait.
translation.ko: - 혼자 갈게 - 그래, 알았어, 여기서 기다릴게

translation.en: Lari will be okay on her own.
This conversation will be much more difficult for me.
I have to say it all now.
Otherwise, I'm afraid I'm never gonna be able to say it again.
translation.ko: 안 그러면 다시는 못 할 것 같으니까

translation.en: Not only because I had you,
but also because I realized what I really want for myself.
translation.ko: 내가 진정 원하는 게 뭔지 깨달았기 때문에

translation.en: I didn't want to be bad.
that you didn't feel to come to me anymore after losing our baby.
translation.ko: 우리 아기를 잃은 후 당신이 더 이상 나한테 오고 싶어 하지 않은 것에 대해

translation.en: That you had to deal with it all alone,
translation.ko: 그걸 혼자 감당해야만 한 것에 대해

translation.en: So you knew everything about Nacho for a long time, didn't you?
translation.ko: 나초에 대해서 오랫동안 다 알고 있었네?

translation.en: When I was a child, my dad used to read me a book.
translation.ko: 어릴 때 아빠가 읽어준 책이 있어

translation.en: I still remember one sentence, a little parable.
translation.ko: 지금도 그 책의 한 부분을 기억해

translation.en: I didn't really understand it back then.
"If it comes back, it's yours forever."
it was never meant to be."
Your dad was a wonderful father.
And you also will be, one day.
Subtitle translation by: Maja Konkolewska and Meredith Cannella
